case.name: Mario Guiseppe v Registrar of Aboriginal Corporationsand Another [2006] FCA 1692 (18 December 2006)

citances.sentence: 1 This appeal concerns the validity of the appointment of an administrator to an Aboriginal corporation pursuant to the Aboriginal Councils and Associations Act 1976 (Cth) (the Act) that was upheld by the decision in Mario Guiseppe v Registrar of Aboriginal Corporations [2006] FCA 1692.
